evidence_in_dialogue: [[Zephyr]] ladies and gentlemen i assure you she 's quite all right

[[Samantha_Dean]] when i made him leave , he said he 'd call an l.a. lawyer and take brandon away from me

[[Zephyr]] you know , lucky for me she let me have some before she mysteriously disappeared
